data.eml:eml: An integrative taxonomic revision of the genus Triphosa Stephens, 1829 (Geometridae: Larentiinae) in the Middle East and Central Asia, with description of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wanke, Dominic, Hausmann, Axel, Rajaei, Hossein (2019): An integrative taxonomic revision of the genus Triphosa Stephens, 1829 (Geometridae: Larentiinae) in the Middle East and Central Asia, with description of two new species. Zootaxa 4603 (1): 39-65, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4603.1.2
